text: Dahej railway station is a railway station on the Western Railway network in the state of Gujarat, India. Dahej railway station is 62 km far away from Bharuch Junction railway station. One MEMU train starts from here. ==Trains== * Dahej - Bharuch MEMU ==See also== * Bharuch district ==References== Category:Railway stations in Bharuch district Category:Vadodara railway division
title: Dahej railway station
